origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'OilOptionsAPI.analyze_market', 'description': 'This function analyzes the market performance of oil options over a specified time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the analysis, e.g., three_months, six_months.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., market_performance, supply_demand.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'The detailed analysis report of the oil options market.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 OilOptionsAPI.analyze_market, 它的参数输入如下: 'timeFrame'是'three_months', 'analysisType'是'market_performance'.
